quote_first: He next proceeded to examine seriatim the dead manâ€™s pockets, turning each of them inside out and taking the contents, where they appeared adapted to his needs: for instance, a silken purse, through the interstices of which some gold was visible; a watch, which however had been injured by the explosion, and had stopt just at the moment -
title: The Ancestral Footstep
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne
